Rated 5 out of 5 by Kaitlyn from Great product, poor packaging choice I absolutely love this stuff! I have 2c/3a, low-porosity, protein sensitive curls, and this line is fabulous for me! The problem is that the consistency is extremely runny, and that does not work well with this kind of packaging. I expected to open it and be able to squeeze it into my hand. It came out into the cap before I even finished opening it the first time! After I knew the consistency and thought I was being careful, I ended up with a glob on the floor. I have poured it into an upright container like what they have the Peace Rose gel-creme in. That works much better. The product is actually amazing enough that I won't even take a star off for that though. I just hope they read this and change the packaging. Anything that can keep my hair from frizzing (and this is the first thing I've found), deserves 5 stars!!!

SKUInfo.Name: Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Grow Leave-In Conditioner

Description:
Its easy to fall in love with smooth, shiny, frizz-free curls but what about unmanageable, dry, frazzled hair? Say hello to SheaMoistures Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Leave-in Conditioner! This all-natural hair treatment provides hydrating nourishment to dry, over-processed hair and leaves you with healthier, shinier, tangle free curls! SheaMoistures Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Leave-in Conditioner is a non-greasy weightless formula infused with goodness of Jamaican Black Castor Oil rich in reparative omegas. Omega acids stimulate the scalp and strengthen hair to reduce shedding and increase resistance to breakage. Certified organic Shea Butter blended into the Conditioner provides deep conditioning which softens curls and coils and makes hair smooth and tangle free. Natural ingredients like Peppermint invigorate hair scalp to make your curls bounce with health and shine!

Make brittle, coarse hair a thing of the past with SheaMoistures Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Leave-in Conditioner!
ExtraField7:
• Shea Butter - Deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair and scalp.
  • Jamaican Black Castor Oil - Loaded with reparative omegas that promote healthy hair growth.
  • Apple Cider Vinegar - Contains natural AHA's that clarify and help regulate pH levels of the scalp.
  • Peppermint - Stimulates the scalp for an invigorating experience.
ExtraField8: Apply to clean, towel-dried hair. Work a generous amount of product into hair from root to ends. Comb through for even distribution. Do not rinse. Apply more to longer hair at the end of problem areas. Can also be used as a rinse-out conditioner.

SKUInfo.Name: Weightless Shea Serum Foundation - Almond

ShortDescription: Customized Coverage that Looks and Feels Totally Natural

CategoryList.CategoryName: Mineral Powder Foundation - Wet or Dry

Description:
SheaMoisture Weightless Shea Serum Foundation is a light, silky, fluid formula that blends easily with fingertips or a makeup sponge to provide light to medium coverage with a natural finish. Shades stay true. No ashy look. Feels comfortable, almost undetectable on the skin. Formulated with natural ingredients and blended with moisturizing Shea Butter and antioxidant-rich Vitamins C & E to nourish and protect skin.

Packaging
Plastic bottle with pump dispenser and cap.

Weightless Shea Serum Foundation - Cocoa is rated 5.0 out of 5 by 1.
Rated 5 out of 5 by JustPlumPretty86 from Little Amount Needed with Maxmium Coverage It is really hard to find make up that is perfect for darker skin tones. Especially make up an affordable price! It blends very well with your skin and you can truly build upon for as much coverage as you need. It does not make your skin look ashy or too red. It is perfect and you can barely feel you are wearing make up. I have used Sephora, Lancome and MAC in the past...MAC discontinued my skin tone, Lancome change of formula and TOO expensive, Sephora you had to blend too much and if not it left an ashy tone to my skin. Good job Shea Moisture! Please keep this! :)

SKUInfo.Name: Perfecting Face Creme Trio - Medium

ShortDescription: Semi-Matte Finish with Oil-Controlling Benefits
Description:
SheaMoisture Perfecting Face Creme Trio is a complexion perfecting kit that provides professional coverage, face sculpting and oil controlling benefits to enhance your natural beauty. The long-wearing formula blends easily to conceal and cover dark marks, rosacea, vitiligo, tattoos and more. Shades can be mixed and blended for highlighting and contouring the face for customized coverage. Formulated with natural ingredients and enriched with nourishing Shea Butter, antioxidant-rich Vitamin E and oil-controlling Corn Starch. Available in three palette combinations: Fair, Medium & Dark. To find your perfect palette, match the medium swatch of each to your skin tone.

Packaging
3-well compact with carton. Includes a spatula & instructional leaflet.
ExtraField8: START with a clean, dry face. For best results, apply your moisturizer and primer prior to use. SCOOP out a small amount of the medium tone with a spatula. Dab on the back of your hand (as a canvas for blending), or apply directly on the area you want to cover. MIX in the lighter and darker tones until you reach your perfect shade. BLEND outward using fingertips or foundation brush over the desired area. Continue to build and blend until coverage is complete. MAXIMIZE and set coverage by finishing with your shade of Sheer Mineral Pressed Powder*. ACCENTUATE the look with your Mineral Powder Blush*. *Not included in kit .
ExtraField10:
Water (Aqua), Cyclopentasiloxane, Ozokerite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isodecyl Isononanote, Dimethicone, Bis-(Glyceryl/Lauryl) Glyceryl Lauryl Dimethicone, Trisiloxane, Butylene, Glycol, Benzophenone-3, Polymethylsilsesquiosane, Nylon-12, Glycerin, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Trimethysiloxysilicate, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Caprylyl Gycol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Sodium Aluminum Hydroxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77492). May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Iron Oxides (CI 77499).

SKUInfo.Name: Mineral Powder Foundation - Wet/Dry - Tan

ShortDescription: Satin to Matte Finish with Medium to Full Coverage

CategoryList.CategoryName: Mineral Powder Foundation - Wet or Dry

Description:
SheaMoisture Mineral Powder Foundation is a mineral powder foundation that helps absorb excess oil while softening the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Use dry for a matte finish with medium coverage or use wet for a satin finish with full coverage. Formulated with nourishing Shea Butter, hydrating Grape Seed Extract and antioxidant Vitamin E to nourish skin without clogging pores. For all skin types, including sensitive skin.

Packaging
Pan with large soft touch compact, includes sponge applicator.
ExtraField8: Apply with dry brush or sponge for light coverage. To use wet, spray a light mist of water onto your brush or sponge. Dip into the pressed powder and dab on skin in short, quick strokes. Blend in light layers, building up to your perfect level of coverage.

Description:
SheaMoisture Shea Butter Luscious Lipstick provides high coverage and glides on like silk while melting onto the lips for smooth, even color that won't bleed or feather. Formulated with natural ingredients and blended with moisturizing Shea Butter and emollients to keep lips soft, smooth and comfortable.

Packaging
Chocolate brown soft-touch lipstick component/clear bottom provides shade identification.
ExtraField8: Apply lip color by starting in the center of the lip. Work from the center up to the cupid's bow and to the outer edges of the upper lip. Then apply to the center of the bottom lip and glide across to the outer edges, following the contours of the mouth.
ExtraField10:
Diisostearyl Malate, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Triethylhexanoin, Ceresin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polybutene, Ozokerite, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Diglyceryl Sebacate/Isopalmitate, Polyethylene, Dicalcium Phosphate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/ Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Synthetic Wax, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Alumina, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Vp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Silica, Glyceryl Caprylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide (CI 77861). May Contain (+/-): Mica (CI 77019), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850:1), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).

SKUInfo.Name: Shea Butter Velvet Lip Crayon - Blossom

ShortDescription: Moisturizing Shea Butter-Rich Color With a Velvet Finish
Description:
SheaMoisture Shea Butter Lip Crayon is an ultra-moisturizing chunky lip crayon that glides on smoothly with a rich, velvet finish and color that lasts. Defines and fills in lips with just a few easy strokes. Formulated with natural ingredients and blended with nourishing Shea Butter, antioxidant-rich Vitamin E, Aloe and Safflower Oil to keep lips soft, supple and hydrated.

Packaging
Color-matched barrel and clear cap for shade identification.
ExtraField8: Apply lip color by starting in the center of the lip. Work from the center to the outer edges of the lip, following the contours of the mouth. Then glide across the entire bottom lip. Can also be used as a lip liner.
ExtraField10:
Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Isopropyl Palmitate, Oleyl Alcohol, Ozokerite, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Candelilla Cera), Lanolin Oil, Paraffin, Lanolin Wax (Lanolin Cera), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Alumina, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140). May Contain (+/-): Mica (CI 77019), Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77491, CI 77492), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 6 (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470).

Rated 5 out of 5 by momdukes805 from never thought i would ever find a product like it I am not a fan of lip gloss for the simply fact; its sticky, tacky, gummy. I have tried several brands before. Sometimes I just want a light coloring, with moisture or shine. Normally I would color in my lips with a lip pencil and add my carmex :-). So once again, I made a purchase. Hate the lighting in Target, it was hard to really see the colors of what I was holding. I made the pricey purchase and got two. I opened it as soon as I returned back to my office, "Caroline", and notice the difference immediately. It didn't have that hard sticky feel in the very beginning, and went on smooth. the initial application stayed on for a few hours, about 3, before reapplying. I have a dark skin tone, with dark lips. I do like neutral lip colors but they are hard to find that wont have me looking like a clown. Caroline is a light color, however blended on my lips, it lightened my lips, without looking costumey and gave them great shine. I am very happy and didn't know Shea Moisture had a makeup line.

Description:
SheaMoisture Shea Butter Lip Crayon is an ultra-moisturizing chunky lip crayon that glides on smoothly with a rich, velvet finish and color that lasts. Defines and fills in lips with just a few easy strokes. Formulated with natural ingredients and blended with nourishing Shea Butter, antioxidant-rich Vitamin E, Aloe and Safflower Oil to keep lips soft, supple and hydrated.

Packaging
Color-matched barrel and clear cap for shade identification.
ExtraField8: Apply lip color by starting in the center of the lip. Work from the center to the outer edges of the lip, following the contours of the mouth. Then glide across the entire bottom lip. Can also be used as a lip liner.
ExtraField10:
Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Isopropyl Palmitate, Oleyl Alcohol, Ozokerite, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Candelilla Cera), Lanolin Oil, Paraffin, Lanolin Wax (Lanolin Cera), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Alumina, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140). May Contain (+/-): Mica (CI 77019), Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77491, CI 77492), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 6 (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470).

LEGEND
*Certified Organic Ingredient.
